activities: Webtrends is a data processor who, acting on behalf of and at the direction of our clients who are data controllers, provides data analysis, audience segmentation and website optimization services based on non-personally identifiable information, as well as limited personally identifiable information, provided by our clients or that we collect for our clients regarding their customer interactions, including information from their web sites.  Webtrends also receives human resources data from the EU on our employees and job applicants for employment-related purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech:
(1) EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for human resources data only; and
(2) TRUSTe dispute resolution process for unresolved issues relating to the transfer of non-HR data from the EU to the US
(3) TRUSTe dispute resolution process.
